sentences.en: A new contract is in place. Additionally, staff will be offered a bonus scheme.

sentences.en: Additionally , OSRAM is the market leader in automotive lamp business.

sentences.en: Additionally, a marked decrease in retention after long - term use is described.
sentences.cn: 此外, 在 长期 的使用以后套筒冠的固位力可能有显著地下降.

sentences.en: Additionally, salary and occupation development are the two most important employee - prompting means.
sentences.cn: 此外薪酬和职业发展是两种最主要的员工激励手段.

sentences.en: Additionally, some mechanism and numerical relationship should be further researched.

sentences.en: Additionally, the heating plate is coated with heat - resistant and anti — corrosion coatings.

sentences.en: Additionally, their small plastic bulb makes them a lot more durable.

sentences.en: Additionally, there is a Transpersonal Chakra above the crown chakra.

sentences.en: All teachers are qualified to teach their native language. Additionally, we select our teachers for their engaging personalities.

sentences.en: Credit and credit cards were additionally a part of his preoccupation.

sentences.en: The birds are additionally protected in the reserves at Birsay.

sentences.en: The maintenance programme will additionally seek to keep the sites free of graffiti.

sentences.en: The supplementary reports on specific subjects may be compiled additionally if necessary.

sentences.en: To the eyes of the middle - aged , Bathsheba was perhaps additionally charming just now.

sentences.en: You can pay bills over the Internet. Additionally, you can check your balance or order statements.
